summary: A group of single guys meet for their weekly, all male, all-night poker game. One of the regulars invites a woman (Liz) to join and she turns out to be a very good player. Things get more ... See full summary Â»
cast: Michael Cudlitz|Ray Porter|Dion Luther|Melissa Sullivan|David Teitelbaum|Thomas Napier|Matt Foyer|Wendell Willat|Elizabeth Rainey|Shannon Kenny|Curt Darling|Julianna Cleveland|Rachel Cudlitz|Bob Gerlach
title: Follow the Bitch
